title: Fix Contact CTA tagline copy, centering, and add stable test hooks

acceptanceCriteria: In the Contact section, the heading text is exactly "Designed by you," (including the comma).
Directly beneath it, the paragraph text is exactly "Executed by Us." (including the period and capitalization).
Both lines are center-aligned on mobile and desktop (no breakpoint causes left alignment).

and
